appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Customize the look and feel of the app
appearance.themeDescription: Choose between light, dark, or system theme
appearance.micaDescription: Enable Windows 11 Mica transparency effect for a modern look
appearance.diffFontSizeDescription: Adjust the font size of the comparison view

general.title: General
general.startMinimizedDescription: Start the app minimized to the system tray
general.rememberWindowPositionDescription: Restore window size and position on startup
general.openLastProjectDescription: Automatically open the last used project when the app starts

scope.title: Settings Scope
scope.resetConfirmation: This will clear all overrides for this project and revert to global defaults. This action cannot be undone.
scope.globalDescription: Changes apply to all projects unless overridden.
scope.projectDescription: Changes apply only to "${name}". Other settings inherit from global defaults.
scope.createPrompt: Create a project to customize settings for specific folders

comparison.title: Comparison
comparison.caseSensitiveDescription: Treat uppercase and lowercase letters as different
comparison.showLineNumbersDescription: Display line numbers in the diff view
comparison.modeDescription: How to match entries between files
comparison.resetToGlobal: Reset all comparison settings to global defaults

previewMatch.title: Preview Match
previewMatch.description: Test how your current settings affect matching logic.

fileHandling.fileSafetyDescription: Automatic local copies for disaster recovery.
fileHandling.resetToGlobal: Reset all file handling settings to global defaults

translationMemory.title: Global Translation Memory
translationMemory.autoLearnDescription: Save translations to local memory for future reuse
translationMemory.clearConfirmContent: This removes all saved translation pairs on this device. This action cannot be undone.

backup.title: Auto-Backup
backup.enabledDescription: Automatically backup files before making changes
backup.maxCopiesDescription: Number of backup copies to keep per file
backup.folderDescription: Leave empty to use the same folder

ai.title: AI Services
ai.providerDescription: Choose your preferred AI service provider
ai.apiKeyDescription: Enter your API key for the selected provider
ai.connectionFailed: Connection failed. Please check your API key.
ai.strategyDescription: Select how you want to translate strings
ai.enableAiTranslationDescription: Allow the app to use AI for translation suggestions
ai.temperatureDescription: Higher values make output more creative
ai.systemContextHint: You are a professional localizer. Maintain the tone and intent of the source string...
ai.systemContextHelper: Provide specific instructions to the AI about your project's style and terminology.
ai.contextStringsDescription: Include surrounding strings for better context
ai.contextCountDescription: Number of surrounding strings to include
ai.resetToGlobal: Reset all AI settings to global defaults

integrations.platformNoticeDescription: System integrations are not available for this platform.
integrations.explorerIntegrationDescription: Add "Open with Localizer" to the Windows Explorer right-click menu for folders.
integrations.fileAssociationsDescription: Register file types to open with Localizer when double-clicked in Explorer.
integrations.protocolHandlerDescription: Register localizer:// URLs to open this application. Allows opening projects directly from browser links or other apps.
integrations.windowMaterialDescription: Select the macOS vibrancy material style
integrations.showDockBadgeDescription: Display untranslated string count on the dock icon badge

developer.title: Developer Settings
developer.localizationKeysDescription: When enabled, all translated text will show their localization keys instead of the translated value. Useful for verifying which key is used where.
developer.performanceOverlayDescription: Display FPS and frame timing information
developer.debugModeDescription: Enable additional logging and debug features
developer.restartTutorialDescription: Reset flags and launch tutorial again
developer.throwExceptionDescription: Trigger a test exception for crash reporting
developer.testExceptionMessage: Test Exception triggered from Developer Options
developer.clearTMWarning: This will delete all learned translations. This cannot be undone.
developer.clearApiKeysWarning: This will remove all API keys from secure storage.
developer.hideOptionsDescription: Disable developer mode (requires 7 taps to re-enable)
developer.factoryResetDescription: Reset all settings and clear data
developer.factoryResetWarning: Are you sure you want to reset all settings? This action cannot be undone.

featureFlags.title: Experimental Features
featureFlags.description: Toggle feature flags locally for testing. These overrides persist across app restarts.
featureFlags.subtitle: Override experimental features

experimental_ai_batch.name: Experimental AI Batch
experimental_ai_batch.description: Enable batch AI translation for multiple rows

new_diff_algorithm.name: New Diff Algorithm
new_diff_algorithm.description: Use improved diffing algorithm for comparisons

enhanced_search.name: Enhanced Search
enhanced_search.description: Enable fuzzy search in translation files

localizationInspectorSection.note: Note: This feature requires app localization to use a wrapper that respects this setting.

about.title: About
about.author: Author
about.developerSteps: You are ${count} steps away from being a developer.
about.settingsManagementDescription: Export your settings to a file to back them up or share with other machines.

settingsView.resetCategoryContent: This will reset all settings in this category to their default values.
settingsView.resetAllContent: This will permanently reset all settings to their factory defaults. This action cannot be undone.
settingsView.latestVersion: You are using the latest version
settingsView.importContent: This will replace all your current settings with the imported ones. This action cannot be undone.

fileComparison.title: File Comparison
fileComparison.restartTutorialDevOnly: Tutorial restart is available in developer mode only.
fileComparison.unsupportedFileTypeSuggestion: Please select a supported localization file.
fileComparison.pickBilingualFile: Please select a bilingual file to compare.
fileComparison.performComparisonFirst: Perform a comparison first to export results.
fileComparison.performComparisonFirstEditor: Please perform a comparison first to see advanced details.
fileComparison.dropFileOrBrowse: Drop file or click to browse
fileComparison.noDiff: No differences found based on keys.
fileComparison.readyToCompareDesc:
Drop localization files above or use the browse buttons
to select files for comparison.
fileComparison.fileNotExist: One or both files from this session no longer exist.
fileComparison.largeFileContent:
The comparison result contains ${count} entries.
Displaying all of them might cause performance issues.

Do you want to proceed?
fileComparison.dontShowAgain: Don't show again for this file
fileComparison.watchingTooltip:
File Watching: ${status}
Automatically recompare when files change on disk
fileComparison.aiSettingsNotAvailable: Navigation to AI Settings not available

directoryComparison.title: Directory Comparison
directoryComparison.selectBothDirectories: Please select both a source and target directory.
directoryComparison.readyToCompareDesc:
Drop folders above or use the browse buttons
to select directories for comparison.
directoryComparison.bulkExportTooltip: Export all comparison results at once
directoryComparison.notDirectoryComparison: This is not a directory comparison.
directoryComparison.directoriesNotExist: One or both directories no longer exist.
directoryComparison.noFilesFound: No files found in selected directories.
directoryComparison.noResultsToExport: No comparison results to export. Run "Compare All" first.
directoryComparison.exportSuccessMessage: Successfully exported ${count} comparison files plus summary.

gitComparison._translatorNote: Git terms (Branch, Commit, Checkout, Merge, Conflict, Pull, Push) should remain in English for all translations to avoid confusion among developers.
gitComparison.title: Repository Comparison
gitComparison.noCommits: No commits found or loaded. Select a branch to load commits.
gitComparison.mergeWarning: This will merge changes into your current working branch. Conflicts may occur.
gitComparison.exportSuccessMessage: Successfully exported ${count} files with full content.
gitComparison.exportDetail: Each file's diff is saved in the "files" subfolder.
gitComparison.noChanges: No changes found between selected refs.

advancedDiff.saveConfirmation: This will save all ${count} modified entries to the target file. This action cannot be undone.
advancedDiff.unsavedChangesWarning: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to discard them?

actionsSection.fillFromTmContent: This will attempt to fill empty target values using matches from the Translation Memory. Existing values will NOT be overwritten.

aiSection.infoCloud: Uses cloud translation to translate empty target values from source.
aiSection.infoAi: Uses AI to translate empty target values from source.
aiSection.translateAllContent:
This will use ${service} to translate all entries with empty target values from ${source} to ${target}.

You can review each suggestion or apply all at once.

issueDetails.title: Issue Details
issueDetails.searchPlaceholder: Search by key, text, or error...

duplicateValue.label: REPEATED TRANSLATION
duplicateValue.warning: Different source texts use this same translation. Check context.

notes.placeholderMismatch: Markers like {name} should match the source.
notes.lengthOutlier: Big length changes can affect how text fits on screen.
notes.duplicateValue: Same translation is used for different keys.

importReview.title: Review Project Import
importReview.customSettingsWarning: This project contains custom settings that will override your defaults while this project is open.
importReview.standardSettings: This project uses standard global settings.

historyView.title: Comparison History
historyView.historyDescription: Your file comparisons will appear here
historyView.clearConfirmationContent: This will permanently delete all comparison history. This action cannot be undone.

compare.title: Compare Files
compare.dropFilesHint: Drop localization files here or use the browse buttons to select files for comparison.

history.title: History
history.noHistoryDescription: Your comparison history will appear here
history.clearHistoryConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear all history?

projects.title: Projects
projects.noProjectsDescription: Create a project to organize your localization files
projects.deleteProjectConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this project?
projects.exportDescription: Create a portable zip file containing source files, configuration, and history.
projects.openProjectFirst: Open a project first to manage its resources.

createDialog.title: Create Project
createDialog.description: A project lets you save custom settings for a specific folder. A ".localizer" folder will be created to store your project configuration.
createDialog.nameLengthError: Name must be at least 2 characters

indicator.tooltipNoProject: Create a project to save custom settings for a folder

glossary.title: Project Glossary
glossary.description: Define terms that should be treated consistently or never translated.
glossary.noTermsDesc:
Add terms that should stay consistent across translations,
or mark brand names that should never be translated.
glossary.doNotTranslateDesc: Keep term exactly as is in target

conflicts.missingApiKeyMessage: This project uses ${service} but no API key is configured. Add your API key in Settings > AI Services, or the app will use the global default.

tm.title: Translation Memories
tm.description: Manage translation memory sources for this project.
tm.globalTmDescription: Use the shared translation memory from your app settings

git.title: Git Comparison
git.noRepositoriesDescription: Open a folder containing a Git repository

conflicts.title: Merge Conflicts Detected
conflicts.description: You must resolve these conflicts before you can continue.
conflicts.abortMergeContent: This will revert all merge changes and return to the state before the merge. This cannot be undone.
conflicts.allResolved: All conflicts in this file have been resolved!
conflicts.stageForCommit: This will stage the file for commit.

quality._translatorNote: API and metric terms (Requests, Tokens, Characters, Prompt, Completion, Export) should remain in English for all translations to maintain consistency with industry terminology.
quality.title: Quality Dashboard
quality.placeholderMismatchDescription: Placeholders like {name} don't match between source and target
quality.lengthOutlierDescription: Translation length significantly differs from source
quality.duplicateValueDescription: Same translation used for multiple keys
quality.missingTranslationDescription: Translation is missing for this key
quality.errorLoading: We could not load your history. Try again.
quality.emptyState: Run a comparison to see your dashboard.
quality.errorBuilding: We could not build the dashboard. Try again.
quality.noUsableData: No usable data was found yet.
quality.noIssuesFound: No issues found in the latest comparisons.
quality.lengthOutliersDesc: Length looks unusual compared to the source.
quality.duplicateValuesDesc: The same translation is used many times.
quality.placeholderDialogDesc: These translations have different placeholders ({name}) than the source.
quality.lengthDialogDesc: These translations are significantly shorter or longer than the source.
quality.exportError: Could not build the report. Please try again.
quality.filesSkipped: Some files were skipped because they were not found.

errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.

firstRun.description: Compare your localization files in seconds.

addIgnorePattern.title: Add Ignore Pattern
addIgnorePattern.testHint: Enter a key to test against pattern

diffViewer.title: Diff Viewer
diffViewer.noMatches: No entries match the current filters
diffViewer.clickToggle: Click the badges above to toggle filters

tutorial.finishMessage: You're all set! Tap anywhere to finish.
tutorial.hintPhase2: Next: filters, search, advanced view, and export.

importSource.title: 1. Import Source File
importSource.description: Use the button below to browse for a file, or drag & drop onto the highlighted area.

importTarget.title: 2. Import Target File
importTarget.description: Use the button below to browse for a file, or drag & drop onto the highlighted area.

compare.title: 3. Compare Files
compare.description: Tap the button below to run the comparison and see the results.

filter.title: 4. Filter Results
filter.description: Use these filters to view Added, Removed, or Modified strings.

search.title: 5. Search Results
search.description: Find specific keys or values using the search bar.

advanced.title: 6. Advanced View
advanced.description: Open the detailed diff view with editing, AI translation, and more.

export.title: 7. Export Results
export.description: Save your comparison as CSV, JSON, or Excel file.

fileNotFound.message: The file or folder could not be found.
fileNotFound.suggestion: Check if the file was moved or deleted.

accessDenied.message: Access to the file was denied.
accessDenied.suggestion: Try running the app as administrator or check file permissions.

isDirectory.message: A folder was selected instead of a file.

fileAccess.message: There was a problem accessing the file.
fileAccess.suggestion: Try closing other programs that might be using it.

unsupportedFormat.message: This file format or operation is not supported.
unsupportedFormat.suggestion: Check the file extension or try a different format.

networkError.message: Could not connect to the server.
networkError.suggestion: Check your internet connection and try again.

notGitRepo.message: This folder is not a Git project.
notGitRepo.suggestion: Navigate to a folder that contains a .git directory.

mergeConflict.message: There are merge conflicts in the repository.

gitAuthFailed.suggestion: Check your credentials in Settings > Version Control.

gitOperationFailed.suggestion: Check the Git view for more details.

invalidJson.message: The file format is invalid or corrupted.
invalidJson.suggestion: Ensure the file contains valid JSON content.

rateLimitReached.suggestion: Wait a few minutes or check your API plan limits.

invalidApiKey.suggestion: Go to Settings > AI Translation to update your API key.

translationServiceError.suggestion: Check your API key and internet connection.

outOfMemory.message: Not enough memory to complete this operation.
outOfMemory.suggestion: Try closing other applications or using smaller files.

genericError.suggestion: Please try again. If the problem persists, restart the app.

validation.connectionTimeout: Connection timed out. Please try again.
validation.couldNotConnect: Could not connect. Please try again.
validation.checkKeyAndTryAgain: Could not connect. Please check the key and try again.
validation.tryAgainLater: Could not connect right now. Please try again later.
validation.serviceUnavailable: Service is unavailable right now. Please try again later.

status.couldNotImportFiles: Could not import the files. Please try again.
status.historyFilesNotFound: One or both files from history not found at original paths.

aiServices.geminiRephraseEmpty: Gemini returned empty response for rephrase
aiServices.openaiEmptyResponse: OpenAI returned empty or failed response
